entry.title: Salted Caramel Cheesecake 8"
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Sugar-Free Bakery
Type: Cake
Price: 1800.00

Celebrate with every bite of our creamy cheesecake with its crushed almond crust, drizzled with rich salted caramel, and topped with chocolate hazelnut balls filled with a surprise twist.

This cake is absolutely:

  • Sugar-free
  • Diabetic-friendly
  • Keto
  • Low Carb

Sugar-Free Salted Caramel Cheesecake 8"
Php 1,800 good for 10 servings
Best consumed immediately

**PLEASE NOTE THAT FULL PAYMENT IS REQUIRED BEFORE YOUR ORDER IS PROCESSED.**

DELIVERY INFO

For sugar-free cakes, we will deliver your orders straight to your doorstep from Sunday-Saturday between 1PM-5PM. Cut-off is every 5PM for Next-Day Delivery from Monday-Sunday.

Please expect a message from our rider when your order is about to be delivered. 

Multiple Address Delivery & Bulk Order

For 2 or more delivery addresses (with a minimum spend of PHP 1,500), send us an email at thesugarfreebakery@gmail.com to receive our multiple address form.

Special Delivery Requests

For special delivery requests outside of our regular delivery schedule for sugar-free cakes (Sunday-Saturday, 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM) kindly contact our Customer Care Team at  0949 786 5399 or thesugarfreebakery@gmail.com to arrange your shipping requests.

entry.title: Gourmet Croissant Gift Box
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Sugar-Free Bakery
Type: Dessert
Price: 650.00

We know you can’t get enough of our sugar-free croissants so we’re adding new flavorful twists to brighten up your summer!


Not flaking out on you are these flavors from our Sugar-Free Gourmet Croissant Gift Box:

  • Strawberries & Cream Croissant with fresh strawberries and cream filling
  • Matcha Pistachio Croissant with dark chocolate filling
  • Almond Flan Croissant with sweet yet sugar-free almond custard filling
  • Golden Hazelnut Croissant with chocolate hazelnut filling

 These croissants are absolutely:

  • Sugar-free
  • Diabetic-friendly

Sugar-Free Gourmet Croissant Gift Box

  • 1 pc  Almond Flan Croissant 
  • 1 pc  Strawberries & Cream Croissant
  • 1 pc  Matcha Pistachio Croissant
  • 1 pc  Golden Hazelnut Croissant 

Php 650 for box of 4

Best consumed immediately 

DELIVERY INFO:

We deliver goods on Sunday-Saturday evening straight to your doorstep between 6PM-9PM. Cut-off is every 5PM for Next-Day Delivery from Monday-Sunday.

Please expect a message from our rider when your order is about to be delivered. 

Multiple Address Delivery & Bulk Order
For 2 or more delivery addresses (with a minimum spend of PHP 2,000), send us an email at thesugarfreebakery@gmail.com to receive our multiple address form.

Special Delivery Requests

For special delivery requests outside of our regular delivery schedule (Sunday-Saturday, 6:00 PM - 9:00 PM), additional fees may apply. Kindly send your inquiries at 0917 705 5876 or thesugarfreebakery@gmail.com.

entry.title: Keto Blueberry Cheesecake 8"
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Sugar-Free Bakery
Type: Dessert
Price: 1500.00

Berry-licious! Our 8” Keto Blueberry Cheesecake is not only mouthwatering, it’s also sugar-free, low carb, and diabetic-friendly! Indeed, the perfect thoughtful gift or grandiose treat for your family and friends. Rich and creamy but definitely not eggy, cold and lumpy. Same light and refreshing flavor, only better! Perfect as a celebratory cake or snack.

This cake is absolutely:

  • Sugar-free
  • Low-carb 
  • Diabetic-friendly

Keto Blueberry Cheesecake 8" Cake
Php 1,500 good for 10 servings
Best consumed immediately

**PLEASE NOTE THAT FULL PAYMENT IS REQUIRED BEFORE YOUR ORDER IS PROCESSED.**

DELIVERY INFO

For sugar-free cakes, we will deliver your orders straight to your doorstep from Sunday-Saturday between 1PM-5PM. Cut-off is every 5PM for Next-Day Delivery from Monday-Sunday.

Please expect a message from our rider when your order is about to be delivered. 

Shelf Life 7 days, refrigerated.
Storage Instructions
Store in airtight container, refrigerated.
Serving Instructions Serve chilled.

entry.title: Sugar-Free Napoleones
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Sugar-Free Bakery
Type: Dessert
Price: 350.00

Sugar-Free Napoleones

If you ever miss munching on Bacolod City’s popular Napoleones, then we’ve got you covered! We’ve gladly turned the famous pastry into a sugar-free and diabetic-friendly treat you’ll surely can’t get enough of. Made of thin layers of golden flaky puff pastry, filled and glazed with custard cream, this Sugar-free Napoleones makes the perfect afternoon treat after a peaceful siesta. It’s a traditional local delicacy, only better!

Box of 6 Napoleones

**Best consumed immediately**

DELIVERY INFO:

We deliver goods on Sunday-Saturday evening straight to your doorstep between 6PM-9PM. Cut-off is every 5PM for Next-Day Delivery from Monday-Sunday.

Please expect a message from our rider when your order is about to be delivered.

entry.title: Himalayan Dark Choco Cake 8"
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Sugar-Free Bakery
Type: Cake
Price: 1500.00

It’s dark, sugar-free, chocolate-y, diabetic-friendly, but also salt-errific! For the love of salty sweets, our Sugar-free Himalayan Dark Chocolate Cake was created for a rich, divine taste you’ll surely love. Pink Himalayan Salt and dark chocolate not only make a great flavor combination, but also drool-worthy visuals. It’s your favorite dark chocolate cake, only better!

This cake is absolutely:

  • Sugar-free
  • Diabetic-friendly

entry.title: Pastry Care Box
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Sugar-Free Bakery
Type: Dessert
Price: 300.00 - 400.00 (6 variants)

When virtual connections aren't enough, send your loved ones the Sugar-Free Pastry Care Box to share.

Each box is handcrafted to include your highly-requested and well-loved pastries that we’ve made sugar-free! We at The Sugar-Free Bakery have lovingly crafted these incredibly light, flaky and soft pastries all wrapped in a care package that you can send to your loved ones for them to savour and enjoy.

Get one to treat yourself and send one to your colleagues and loved ones to let them know that you love and miss them!

Nothing’s sweeter than the gift of sugar-free!

Sugar-Free Pastry Care Box

  • 1 Sugar-Free Herbed Croissant
  • 1 Sugar-Free Pain Au Chocolat
  • 1 Sugar-Free Mango Custard Danish
  • 1 Sugar-Free Blueberry Pinwheel Danish
  • 1 Sugar-Free Almond Croissant 

Php 400 for a box of 5 assorted croissants 

Or enjoy your sugar-free, incredibly light, flaky, and soft pastry of choice in a care package of 5, which you can easily send to your loved ones. Prices vary per flavor.

DELIVERY INFO:

We deliver goods on Sunday-Saturday evening straight to your doorstep between 6PM-9PM. Cut-off is every 5PM for Next-Day Delivery from Monday-Sunday.

Please expect a message from our rider when your order is about to be delivered.
